comment.author: 16074369@N07
comment._content:
Surname: BINNS
Firstname: George William
Service Number: 22114
Date Death: 17/07/1916
Place of birth: Rawdon Yorks
Other: 6th Bn.
SNWM roll: THE KING'S OWN SCOTTISH BORDERERS
Rank: Pte
Theatre of death: F.& F.

comment.author: 62508825@N00
comment._content: Named on British Roll of Honour, Battle of Delville Wood, one of the engagements of the Battle of the Somme.
